articles.description: What are the stories to look out for as the Houston Astros and Philadelphia Phillies prepare to meet in the 2022 World Series?
articles.content:
The Phillies ended the regular-season with an interleague series in Houston in early October - losing two of the three games but clinching their National League wild card place
